Package org.jpl7

Class Util

java.lang.Object
org.jpl7.Util
public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides a bunch of static utility methods to support JPL's Java API.

    • termArrayToList

      @Deprecated public static Term termArrayToList​(Term[] terms)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.termArrayToList(Term[] terms)
      Converts an array of Terms to a JPL representation of a Prolog list of terms whose members correspond to the respective array elements.
      Parameters:
      terms - An array of Term
      Returns:
      Term a list of the array elements

    • subsToString

      Converts a substitution, in the form of a Map from variable names to Terms, to a String.
      Parameters:
      varnames_to_Terms - A Map from variable names to Terms.
      Returns:
      String A String representation of the variable bindings

    • namevarsToMap

      public static java.util.Map<org.jpl7.fli.term_t,​Variable> namevarsToMap​(Term nvs)
      Converts a (JPL) list of Name=Var pairs (as yielded by atom_to_term/3) to a Map from Prolog variables (necessarily in term_t holders) to named JPL Variables
      Parameters:
      nvs - A JPL list of Name=Var pairs (as yielded by atom_to_term/3)
      Returns:
      Map A Map from Prolog variables (necessarily in term_t holders) to named JPL Variables

    • textToTerm

      @Deprecated public static Term textToTerm​(java.lang.String text)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.textToTerm(String text)
      Converts a Prolog source text (as a String) to a corresponding JPL Term (in which each Variable has the appropriate name from the source text).
      Parameters:
      text - A Prolog source text denoting a term
      Returns:
      Term a JPL Term equivalent to the given source text
      Throws:
      PrologException - containing error(syntax_error(_),_) if text is invalid as a term.

    • textParamsToTerm

      public static Term textParamsToTerm​(java.lang.String text, Term[] params)
      Converts a Prolog source text to a corresponding JPL Term (in which each Variable has the appropriate name from the source text), replacing successive occurrences of ? in the text by the corresponding element of Term[] params. (New in JPL 3.0.4) Throws PrologException containing error(syntax_error(_),_) if text is invalid.
      Parameters:
      text - A Prolog source text denoting a term
      params - parameters to be injected in each ?
      Returns:
      Term a JPL Term equivalent to the given source text

    • stringArrayToList

      @Deprecated public static Term stringArrayToList​(java.lang.String[] a)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.stringArrayToList(String[] a)
      Converts an array of String to a corresponding JPL list of atoms
      Parameters:
      a - An array of String objects
      Returns:
      Term a JPL list of atoms corresponding to the given String array

    • intArrayToList

      @Deprecated public static Term intArrayToList​(int[] a)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.intArrayToList(int[] a)
      Converts an array of int to a corresponding JPL list
      Parameters:
      a - An array of int values
      Returns:
      Term a JPL list corresponding to the given int array

    • intArrayArrayToList

      @Deprecated public static Term intArrayArrayToList​(int[][] a)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.intArrayArrayToList(int[][] a)
      Converts an array of arrays of int to a corresponding JPL list of lists
      Parameters:
      a - An array of arrays of int values
      Returns:
      Term a JPL list of lists corresponding to the given int array of arrays

      Whether the Term represents a proper list
      Parameters:
      term - a term
      Returns:

    • listToLength

      @Deprecated public static int listToLength​(Term term)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.listLength(Term)
      Returns the length of a list
      Parameters:
      term - any Term
      Returns:
      the length of the proper list which the Term represents, else -1

    • listToTermArray

      @Deprecated public static Term[] listToTermArray​(Term t)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.listToTermArray(Term)
      Builds a Java array of Terms from a a list of terms (as a Compound)
      Parameters:
      t - a compound term that is a list
      Returns:
      an array of terms, one per element in the list

    • atomListToStringArray

      @Deprecated public static java.lang.String[] atomListToStringArray​(Term t)
      Deprecated.
      Use Term.atomListToStringArray(Term)
      Converts a term representing a list of atoms into an array of Strings, each element in the array being a String for the corresponding atom e.g., [a, b, 1
      Parameters:
      t - a compound term that is a list of atoms
      Returns:
      a String array representing the list of atoms
